hero.title: Vault
description: Vault is a new marketplace app here to bring a convenient and attractive way of introducing sustainable fashion to a global audience. Their goal is to banish the stigma around selling and purchasing second hand clothing with a  minimal and easy to use platform.

projectDetails.title: Market Research
projectDetails.description: Although there are many other social e-commerce apps, I felt they all held an overwhelming amount of clutter and distractions between the checkout of an item.

projectDetails.title: Wireframes
projectDetails.description: Continuing from my research, I established a fluent way for the user to navigate through the app, with no unnecessary steps and add ons.

projectDetails.title: App Design
projectDetails.description: I designed a simple and modern interface to compliment the usability of the app, which also allows each product to be clear and inviting.

text: Small yet effective features, such as selling and posting tips, have been implemented to help the user reach their full selling potential and to gain a positive experience of using Vault. The foolproof interface accompanied with the minimal branding determines a timeless product.
Vault now have a platform with the potential to grow and influence a worldwide community to make sustainable fashion choices.
